Steps.Message: Update at 01:39 - Our engineers isolated 8 more properties at 00:57 so they could progress with repairs in safety. It is going to them longer than we anticipated and they are now aiming at completing work and having gall power back between 03:30 and 04:30. We apologise for the delay and will keep you up to date with news from site.

We became aware of a power cut at 21:44. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 01:39 - Our engineers isolated 8 more properties at 00:57 so they could progress with repairs in safety. It is going to them longer than we anticipated and they are now aiming at completing work and having gall power back between 03:30 and 04:30. We apologise for the delay and will keep you up to date with news from site.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
